data.lyric:
[ti:Alone Again (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Alone Again (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:04.24]Lyrics by：Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Jason "DaHeala" Quenneville/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Adam Feeney
[00:08.49]Composed by：Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Jason "DaHeala" Quenneville/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Adam Feeney
[00:12.74]Take off my disguise
[00:18.33]I'm living someone else's life
[00:24.49]Suppressing who I was inside
[00:28.96]So I throw 2 000 ones in the sky
[00:36.51]Together we're alone
[00:40.43]Together we're alone
[00:42.24]In Vegas I feel so at home
[00:45.72]In Vegas I feel so at home
[00:47.92]I'm falling only for the night
[00:52.62]So I throw 2 000 ones in the sky
[00:57.56]The sky
[01:00.60]How much to light up my star again
[01:06.20]And rewire all my thoughts
[01:12.32]Oh baby won't you remind me what I am
[01:16.64]And break break my little cold heart
[02:11.51]Call me up and I'll send for you
[02:18.46]Take me down to your altitude
[02:24.76]I don't know if I can be alone again
[02:31.78]I don't know if I can sleep alone again
[02:39.64]Check my pulse for a second time
[02:46.54]I took too much I don't wanna die
[02:52.99]I don't know if I can be alone again
[02:59.89]I don't know if I can sleep alone again
[03:36.09]Count it up it's all for you count it up
[03:43.10]Count it up it's all for you count it up
[03:49.36]I don't know if I can be alone again
[03:56.34]I don't know if I can be alone again
data.trans:
[ti:Alone Again (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.24]//
[00:08.49]//
[00:12.74]卸下我的伪装
[00:18.33]我一直过着别人的生活
[00:24.49]压抑自己的内心
[00:28.96]所以我选择让支离破碎的自己灰飞烟灭
[00:36.51]我们一起沦为孤家寡人
[00:40.43]我们一起沦为孤家寡人
[00:42.24]在维加斯让我感到安心
[00:45.72]在维加斯让我感到安心
[00:47.92]我只是为这一夜而倾倒
[00:52.62]我选择让支离破碎的自己灰飞烟灭
[00:57.56]灰飞烟灭
[01:00.60]怎样才能再次点亮我的星辰
[01:06.20]重组我的思想
[01:12.32]哦 宝贝 你不能帮我找回自己吗
[01:16.64]粉碎我冰冷的心
[02:11.51]只要你呼唤我 我便为你不顾一切
[02:18.46]带我去往你的维度
[02:24.76]我不知道我是否还能再忍受独自一人的感觉
[02:31.78]我不知道我是否还能孤枕而眠
[02:39.64]再次检查我的脉搏 确认自己是否还活着
[02:46.54]即便我承受了太多痛苦 可我对人世仍有留恋
[02:52.99]我不知道我是否还能再忍受独自一人的感觉
[02:59.89]我不知道我是否还能孤枕而眠
[03:36.09]算起来 全都拜你所赐
[03:43.10]算起来 全都拜你所赐
[03:49.36]我不知道我是否还能再忍受独自一人的感觉
[03:56.34]我不知道我是否还能再忍受独自一人的感觉
